description: tarot cards and basic information about them, as well as references to corresponding scans

cards.name: The Fool
cards.challenge: Take a leap of faith! Choose someone at the party and convince them to join you in a spontaneous dance-off. Loser takes a sip!

cards.name: The Magician
cards.challenge: Embrace your inner magician. Perform a magic trick for the group. If they're not amazed, take three sips.

cards.name: The High Priestess
cards.challenge: Channel your mysterious side. Share an interesting secret with the group. If they can't guess whether it's true or false, they drink.

cards.name: The Empress
cards.challenge: Embrace luxury! Compliment someone's outfit extravagantly. If they blush, they take a sip; if not, you take one.

cards.name: The Emperor
cards.challenge: Assume authority! Give someone at the party an order, and if they follow it, they're safe. If not, they drink.

cards.name: The Hierophant
cards.challenge: Confess your silliest misdeed to the group. If they forgive you, you're safe; if not, it's time for a sip.

cards.name: The Lovers
cards.challenge: Celebrate new connections! Take a shot with someone you've never spoken to before. Cheers to unexpected friendships!

cards.name: The Chariot
cards.challenge: Claim victory on the dance floor! Challenge someone to a dance battle. The winner gets to assign a sip to the loser.

cards.name: Strength
cards.challenge: Show your inner strength! Flex your muscles for everyone. The first person to mimic your flex accurately is safe; others take a sip.

cards.name: The Hermit
cards.challenge: Embrace solitude! Take a moment alone to come up with an impromptu poem. Share it with the group, and if they applaud, you're safe; if not, drink up.

cards.name: Wheel of Fortune
cards.challenge: Leave it to fate! Let someone else at the party make a decision for you. If it turns out well, they're safe; if not, they drink.

cards.name: Justice
cards.challenge: Hold a mini court session! Choose two people to state their cases for a silly dispute. The group votes, and the 'guilty' party takes a sip.

cards.name: The Hanged Man
cards.challenge: Reveal a hidden talent! Whether it's juggling or singing, perform for the group. If they applaud, you're safe; if not, take a sip.

cards.name: Death
cards.challenge: Embrace change! Swap drinks with someone else at the party. If you both like the new drink, you're safe; if not, both take a sip.

cards.name: Temperance
cards.challenge: Find balance! Walk a straight line (real or imaginary) with a drink in hand. If you succeed, choose someone else to take a sip; if not, it's your turn.

cards.name: The Devil
cards.challenge: Confront temptation! Choose a partner for a quick game of rock-paper-scissors. The loser takes a sip, and the winner revels in resisting the 'devilish' temptation.

cards.name: The Tower
cards.challenge: Build and destroy! Use building blocks or cards to create a tower. Knock it down, and everyone takes a sip. If it stands, you're safe.

cards.name: The Star
cards.challenge: Embrace your celestial side! Share your zodiac sign and a fun fact about it. If someone else knows a fact about your sign, they're safe; if not, they drink.

cards.name: The Moon
cards.challenge: Howl at the moon! Choose a friend to join you in a howling competition. The most enthusiastic howler is safe; the others take a sip.

cards.name: The Sun
cards.challenge: Bask in the sunlight! Share the happiest moment of your week. If it brings smiles, you're safe; if not, take a sip.

cards.name: Judgement
cards.challenge: Face the past! Share a funny or embarrassing story from your past. If the group laughs with you, you're safe; if not, take a sip.

cards.name: The World
cards.challenge: Celebrate achievements! Share a recent accomplishment, and everyone raises their glasses for a toast. Cheers to your success!

cards.name: Ace of Cups
cards.challenge: Dive into romance! Propose a toast to love and take a sip. If someone else proposes a toast, they're safe; if not, they take a sip.

cards.name: Two of Cups
cards.challenge: Spill the tea! Share a secret crush or a funny dating story. If it gets laughs or awws, you're safe; if not, take a sip.

cards.name: Three of Cups
cards.challenge: Unleash your unconventional side! Perform a quirky dance move for the group. If it gets applause, you're safe; if not, take a sip.

cards.name: Four of Cups
cards.challenge: Satisfy a restless lover! Offer to refill someone's drink. If they decline, they drink; if not, you're safe.

cards.name: Five of Cups
cards.challenge: Face the music! Share a breakup story or a failed endeavor. If the group sympathizes, you're safe; if not, take a sip.

cards.name: Six of Cups
cards.challenge: Share the joy! Give someone a compliment, and if they return the favor, you're safe; if not, both take a sip.

cards.name: Seven of Cups
cards.challenge: Cut through illusions! Challenge someone to a quick game of charades. If they guess your word, they're safe; if not, they take a sip.

cards.name: Eight of Cups
cards.challenge: Move on from the past! Encourage someone to join you in a symbolic gesture of leaving something behind. If they agree, you're safe; if not, both take a sip.

cards.name: Nine of Cups
cards.challenge: Make a wish! Share a personal desire or goal. If the group supports it, you're safe; if not, take a sip.

cards.name: Ten of Cups
cards.challenge: Build family bonds! Propose a group activity that fosters togetherness. If they agree, you're safe; if not, take a sip.

cards.name: Page of Cups
cards.challenge: Embrace the watery vibe! Share a dreamy or creative idea. If someone else appreciates it, you're safe; if not, take a sip.

cards.name: Knight of Cups
cards.challenge: Rally around a cause! Propose a fun and passionate group activity. If they're on board, you're safe; if not, take a sip.

cards.name: Queen of Cups
cards.challenge: Sway with emotion! Express an opinion or idea with deep emotion. If it resonates, you're safe; if not, take a sip.

cards.name: King of Cups
cards.challenge: Foster fairness and tolerance! Settle a friendly debate or dispute with a fair decision. If they agree, you're safe; if not, take a sip.

cards.name: Ace of Swords
cards.challenge: Make a decisive move! Challenge someone to a quick game of rock-paper-scissors. Winner assigns a sip to the loser.

cards.name: Two of Swords
cards.challenge: Refuse to fight! Propose a toast to peace and cooperation. If someone else proposes a toast, they're safe; if not, they take a sip.

cards.name: Three of Swords
cards.challenge: Turn pain into gain! Share a past heartbreak or tough experience. If it inspires empathy, you're safe; if not, take a sip.

cards.name: Four of Swords
cards.challenge: Postpone decisions! Take a break from the party chaos and meditate for a minute. If you return refreshed, you're safe; if not, take a sip.

cards.name: Five of Swords
cards.challenge: Guard against betrayal! Choose a partner for a quick trust-building exercise. If you succeed, you're both safe; if not, both take a sip.

cards.name: Six of Swords
cards.challenge: Navigate unexpected consequences! Blindfold someone and guide them through a simple obstacle course. If they succeed, you're safe; if not, both take a sip.

cards.name: Seven of Swords
cards.challenge: Question trust! Choose someone to answer three random questions. If their answers seem truthful, they're safe; if not, they take a sip.

cards.name: Eight of Swords
cards.challenge: Break free from victimhood! Share a past challenge you've overcome. If the group applauds, you're safe; if not, take a sip.

cards.name: Nine of Swords
cards.challenge: Avoid future regrets! Propose a lighthearted challenge for someone to undertake. If they succeed, you're safe; if not, they take a sip.

cards.name: Ten of Swords
cards.challenge: Put off plans! Choose someone to postpone a decision or action. If they agree, you're safe; if not, both take a sip.

cards.name: Page of Swords
cards.challenge: Embrace intellectual curiosity! Share a fascinating fact with the group. If it sparks interest, you're safe; if not, take a sip.

cards.name: Knight of Swords
cards.challenge: Avoid blunders! Challenge someone to a quick word association game. If they respond swiftly, they're safe; if not, they take a sip.

cards.name: Queen of Swords
cards.challenge: Use clever communication! Describe an everyday object in a creative and entertaining way. If the group appreciates it, you're safe; if not, take a sip.

cards.name: King of Swords
cards.challenge: Exercise sharp decision-making! Settle a playful dispute with a decisive ruling. If they accept it, you're safe; if not, take a sip.

cards.name: Ace of Wands
cards.challenge: Walk softly and carry a big stick! Choose someone for a playful 'duel' using rolled-up paper as swords. Winner assigns a sip
